string-array.name: question
string-array.item: You haven\'t done your homework. What are you going to do?
Your teacher entered the room, and suddenly the class was quiet. \"Please close your books. Today we\'re writing a test.\" You haven\'t learned anything. What will you do now?
Your teacher is really angry because a student is talking all the time. But he thinks that you are this person. How do you want to defend yourself?

You are playing Tetris on your calculator, suddenly you notice that the teacher is standing in front of you. He starts yelling about something. After he finished his rant, he asks you a question, but you do not know the answer. What will you do now?
Your teacher is ill, so you have a free lesson. What will you do?
Someone in your class needs help. What are you going to do?
Your neighbours are trying to talk all the time with you.
You have to write an essay about something. How are you going to accomplish that?
You have a free lesson before a major test. You are very stressed. What are you going to do?
The teacher has explained something, but you didn\'t understand it.
You found a wallet at your desk.
You have a \"little\" chemical Issue. Now in front of you, there is a fire.
